intro: Appendicula tubilabia, commonly known as the tubular labia plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Campanulaceae. It is native to the mountainous regions of Central America and northern South America. The plant is characterized by its distinctive tubular flowers, which are typically blue or violet in color. Appendicula tubilabia thrives in moist, well-drained soils and prefers partial to full shade. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its elegant appearance and unique floral structure.
